Originally I thought this was a chain of one guy getting bodyswapped & cucked by another dude & then the dude who cucked him gets cucked in the next chapter until it comes full circle with the guy from the first chapter cucking someone else but the plot is more wild than that.  

At the end of the 1st chapter the first guy discovers that his wife in his body is missing.  In the 2nd chapter after the boss bodyswaps and gets fucked/cucked the subordinate answers a call for a promotion from a cleaning service.  Remember the 1st guy?  Well he works for a cleaning service.

In the opening of the third chapter it's revealed that the first guy went through a sudden personality change and is moving up in his company.  Remember his wife?  Well she was described as this super driven career-oriented woman.  So with that in mind you understand the last panel: the wife from the first story stayed in her husband's body.  This kinda confirms everyone stayed bodyswapped which is such a clusterfuck.
